projects.title: SEE
projects.type: System for Envisioning Environment Capstone Project
projects.description: In my senior capstone, my team built a wearable system to assist blind individuals without a cane. I led development of the stereo vision module using Python and Raspberry Pi cameras.

projects.title: March Madness Predictor
projects.description: In my Artificial Intelligence class, I worked with a team of three to build a machine learning tool that predicts NCAA tournament outcomes, with a focus on identifying upsets using historical data from Kaggle.

projects.title: This Website
projects.description: I designed and built this website using TypeScript and React, styled with Chakra UI and Ark UI components. It's hosted on Render.io and serves as a place to showcase my projects, experience, and interests.

projects.title: Robotic Arm
projects.description: For my Embedded Design class at Northeastern University, I developed a robotic arm using pulse width modulation (PWM) to control its movements. The goal was to program the arm to pick up a bottle from various positions and move it with precision.

projects.title: NU Electric Racing Club
projects.description: As part of the telemetry team in NU Electric Racing, I worked on real-time data transfer using XBee modules and visualized performance metrics with InfluxDB Flux to monitor key car components.

projects.title: NEU SEDS, Rover Team
projects.description: In the Students for the Exploration and Development of Space club (SEDS) at Northeastern, I worked on the autonomous navigation team, focusing on rover localization systems. This gave me hands-on experience in robotics and space exploration.

projects.title: UNET Image Classifier
projects.description: I built a full pipeline for bird image segmentation and classification using a U-Net model. The process included scraping data, labeling with the LabelBox API, automating mask generation for large datasets, and training a multi-class segmentation model with high accuracy.
